data.comment: The match has started at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 1, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Saint-Etienne push upfield and Mahdi Camara gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Lyon defence.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In the minute 5, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 6, Memphis Depay for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Lyon.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne pushes forward through Charles Abi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lyon drive forward but Moussa Dembele is judged offside.
In the minute 11, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Groupama Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Lyon.
In Lyon Lyon attack through Memphis Depay. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Francois Letexier awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Francois Letexier waits before resuming play because Memphis Depay for Lyon is still down.
In the minute 25, Lyon's Memphis Depay is back in action after a slight knock.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 27, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier signals a Lyon throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In Lyon Lyon's Moussa Dembele is caught offside.
In the minute 33, Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 35, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moussa Dembele for Lyon is whistled offside.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Lyon's area.
In the minute 38, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lyon's half.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
In the minute 39, Lyon have a goal kick.
Lyon drives forward and Houssem Aouar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Lyon, Adil Aouchiche (Saint-Etienne) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 40, Own goal! Anthony Lopes has scored at the wrong end to make it 0-1.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi is on target but unsuccessful.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 42, Lyon's Maxence Caqueret has been booked in Lyon.
Denis Bouanga is back on the pitch.
In the minute 43, Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Houssem Aouar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint-Etienne defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Lyon.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 45, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Lyon.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Groupama Stadium.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lyon.
Saint-Etienne's Yvan Neyou breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 50, Lyon needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Bruno Guimaraes (Lyon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 52, Denis Bouanga (Saint-Etienne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Zaydou Youssouf (Saint-Etienne) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 53, Lyon's Memphis Depay gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Francois Letexier awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lyon to check on Houssem Aouar, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Important block from the Lyon defence as Denis Bouanga fires in a strike for Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 56, Thiago Mendes (Lyon) has replaced the possibly injured Houssem Aouar.
In the minute 57, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Paqueta replacing Bruno Guimaraes.
Tino Kadewere is replacing Moussa Dembele for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a Lyon throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 59, Lyon advance rapidly upfield but Francois Letexier blows for offside.
Saint-Etienne are pushing forward but Denis Bouanga's finish is wide of the goal.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 61, Saint-Etienne's Harold Moukoudi breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Memphis Depay gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lyon.
Lyon's Maxence Caqueret misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 64, Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Lucas Gourna Douath (Saint-Etienne) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Free kick Lyon.
Goal! Tino Kadewere equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Maxwel Cornet.
In the minute 66, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 67, Romain Hamouma is replacing Adil Aouchiche for the away team.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Maxwel Cornet for Lyon has been booked by Francois Letexier and receives a first yellow card.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Karl Toko Ekambi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Lyon!
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Lyon, Karl Toko Ekambi of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tino Kadewere scores to make it 2-1 at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Claude Puel is making the team's second substitution at Groupama Stadium with Wahbi Khazri replacing Charles Abi.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 77, Romain Hamouma of Saint-Etienne smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Maxwel Cornet with Melvin Michel Maxence Bard. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Francois Letexier awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Lucas Gourna Douath with Aimen Moueffek.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Maxence Rivera is on a sub for Zaydou Youssouf for Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 81, Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 83, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
At Groupama Stadium, Lucas Paqueta has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Francois Letexier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lyon's half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
Jean Lucas is replacing Maxence Caqueret for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 87, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a penalty...
Saint-Etienne were awarded a penalty ... Which Denis Bouanga failed to convert!
Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Denis Bouanga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 89, Lyon have a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Lyon's Lucas Paqueta looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lyon.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Miguel Trauco of Saint-Etienne gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi is on target but unsuccessful.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Lucas Paqueta is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Aimen Moueffek (Saint-Etienne) has received a yellow card from Francois Letexier.
At Groupama Stadium, Thiago Mendes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
